name: Save The Field Of O' Meadow
name_original: Save The Field Of O' Meadow
description:
You have to Save The Field Of O' Meadow! The Field needs YOU to collect all of the water drops to water all of the plants in the Field! It is up to you to save the field.

Save The Field Of O' Meadow was created for the Great Spring Game Jam: 2021 hosted by Firith.

Currently, the game only has 4 levels, since I started in the Game Jam a little late. However, I intend to add more levels in the future.

Controls:
W or Up Arrow Key to jump.
A or Left Arrow Key to move left.
D or Right Arrow Key to move right.
V to mute music.
P to reset the level.
